Reviews.Title: perfect phone for me
Reviews.Author: nikbi
Reviews.Content: This phone is everything i needed from a smartphone.Camera is ridiculously good as Rich Recording is.Symbian OS is very powerful, with full multitaskingand still very energy efficient and not data centric as Android.Nokia maps with offline navigation,HDMI out,FM transmitter, etc.I found all the apps that i need. Excellent value. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Nokia 808
Reviews.Author: R.Clarke
Reviews.Content: Amazing phone and a great price and new as advertised. The others don't come close to this baby, no android but still a damn good phone.

Reviews.Title: Good Cell, good camera
Reviews.Author: Francisco Aparecido Pereira
Reviews.Content: Good Câmera, fast system, easy operation... recommended for lovers of tecnology and photo, this cel phone is simply the best.
